meanings.definition: A small video camera that is connected to a computer and can transmit live images over the internet.
meanings.sent1: I use webcams to video chat with my friends.
meanings.sent2: The webcams in the classroom help students connect with remote learners.
meanings.sent3: The webcams at the zoo captured a funny monkey moment.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like webcams, capturing every detail of the scene.
meanings.sent5: The webcams in the security system kept a watchful eye on the building.

meanings.definition: The act of using a webcam to communicate with others online.
meanings.sent1: Online meetings are made easier with webcams.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys the webcams to stay in touch with family abroad.
meanings.sent3: The webcams made the virtual birthday party feel real.
meanings.sent4: His smile lit up the screen during the webcam call.
meanings.sent5: The webcams brought distant friends together for a virtual game night.
